text: Mike Johanns (born June 18, 1950) is an American politician. He was the United States Senator from Nebraska. Johanns is a member of the U.S. Republican Party. He studied at St. Mary's University, Minnesota and at Creighton University. He is married to Stephanie Johanns. They have two children. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Nebraska Category:American mayors Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:United States senators from Nebraska Category:United States Secretaries of Agriculture Category:Politicians from Iowa Category:People from Lincoln, Nebraska
title: Mike Johanns
